game.name: Legendary
game.shortDescription: All creatures of ancient myth, legend and lore are real  they've just been sealed away for thousands of years inside Pandora's Box, waiting... When a thief named Deckard is hired to steal an ancient artifact, he unwittingly triggers a war between man and myth.
